title: How to Draw on a Samsung Galaxy

steps.title: Open your Galaxy's Notes app.
steps.content: Open your Galaxy's Notes app. Your Samsung Galaxy phone or tablet lets you draw in the Notes app. Find and tap the notepad icon on the Apps menu to open Notes.

steps.title: Tap the "+" icon.
steps.content: Tap the "+" icon. This yellow button creates a new blank note. Alternative, you can open an existing note to draw in.

steps.title: Tap the drawing option.
steps.content: Tap the drawing option. Tap the pencil to start drawing. You'll see it on the toolbar at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Choose a color and brush type.
steps.content: Choose a color and brush type. You can see available colors and brush types at the top of your screen. Tap a color or a brush to select it.

steps.title: Create your drawings.
steps.content: Create your drawings. You can tap your finger or use the stylus to draw. You'll be able to change colors and brush tips as you go.
